name: COMPLICATION_DX_MODE
description: The COMPLICATION_DX_MODE table contains the test or technique used to diagnose the patient.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MODE_OF_DX_C_NAME
columns.description: This item indicates the test or technique used to diagnose the patient.
